content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Bruce Willis

{| class="infobox" style="width:20em; text-align:left; font-size:90%; vertical-align:middle; background:#white;"
|-
! colspan="2" style="text-align:center;"| Bruce Willis awards' list
|-
| colspan=3 style="text-align:center;"|   Willis in June 2006
|-
|}
The following is a list of awards and nominations received by American actor, producer, and singer Bruce Willis.

|-

| Funniest Male Guest Appearance in a Television Series
| Friends
|
|}
